titles.title: Small Business Owners' Health Insurance Deductibility Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow self-employed individuals to deduct the full cost of their health insurance.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/4/1997--Introduced. Small Business Owners' Health Insurance Deductibility Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the deduction allowed for health insurance costs for self-employed individuals to 100 percent.
